title: Chapter 1871 - Seeing Li Fuyou Again
body:
Chapter 1871 - Seeing Li Fuyou Again

Boom!

Sword qi swept outward like an unstoppable ripple, starting from the far reaches of the firmament and spreading through time and space, tearing countless holes in the barriers between worlds.

Quite some time passed before it dissipated.

Su Yi stood there in astonishment. Once slash, and he forced the gods to retreat!? Just what kind of unbelievable power does that take!?

“Li Fuyou! You, again! What does it take to get rid of you!?”

An infuriated, bitter roar resounded from across time and space. It came from the young Daoist wielding a wooden sword.

Li Fuyou!

Su Yi finally understood who the illusory figure hovering over the Sword of the Nine Hells was.

“You’re wrong,” the woman riding the Vermillion Bird said through gnashed teeth. “He died a long time ago, and his sword, Phoenix Song, is still suppressed on the Boundless Battlefield. This is no more than an imprint he left behind, and it will soon dissipate!"

“Alas, we just barely missed our chance.” The man who attacked with an entire star domain let out a long sigh.

“The Path of Divinity will soon appear in the Immortal Realm. He doesn’t have long to live even if he’s Li Fuyou’s reincarnation!” said...
